alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Dunn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dunn and southwestern Chippewa Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colfax, or 14 miles northeast of Menomonie, moving east at 30 mph. Dime sized hail has been reported with this storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bloomer around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Chippewa Falls. This includes U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 96 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
